item.title: BSE PSU index crashes 20% from peak, enters bear territory: Turnaround likely or more pain ahead?

review.headline_rewrite: BSE PSU index crashes 20% from peak, enters bear territory: Turnaround likely or more pain ahead?
bullets: BSE PSU index: The gauge of index representing the public sector companies has entered into the bear territory, following a 20% crash from its
The BSE PSU index settled the last trading session on August 29 at 18,319.45, down 20.41% from its all-time high of 23018.87.
Meanwhile, other PSU stocks like Rail Vikas Nigam, Oil India, UCO Bank, Central Bank, REC and IREDA have lost between 40-49%, according to Trendlyne
According to analysts, a host of factors have contributed to the decline in the PSU index and its constituents — earnings slowdown, profit taking

item.title: Greenzo Energy wins green hydrogen plant order from Jindal Stainless

review.headline_rewrite: Greenzo Energy wins green hydrogen plant order from Jindal Stainless
bullets: Greenzo Energy India Limited has secured an order from Jindal Stainless Limited (JSL) to supply and commission a green hydrogen electrolyser plant at JSL’s
The plant will have a designed capacity of 472,409 kg per year and is scheduled for delivery within six months of contract signing.
The electrolyser system features indigenous alkaline bipolar technology delivering hydrogen at 30 bar pressure with 99.99999 per cent purity.

item.title: India pushes back against US moves on Russian oil imports
